name: Flashback (Noah Rigden)
description:
The art asset pack that I used is called the:

- Penny Pixel Art

However I can no longer find a suitable link for credit at this point, unfortunately that is the only information I can give. 

The first ever completed solo game made by me: Flashback. 

This game takes a noname character as she explores into a temple, and finds a dark  secret about her world...
